name: Nidoran Female
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: Although small, its venomous barbs make this Pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon named Nidoran Female or Nidoran Male and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can’t use this attack if your Bench is full.)
